subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Paula Creamer ran away with the Tournament of Champions, winning by eight strokes over Birdie Kim in Mobile, Ala. Creamer, 21, closed with a four-under-par 68 to finish at 20-under 268 — a stroke off the tournament record set last year by Lorena Ochoa.
